content: you probably know the national lampoon s christmas movie christmas vacation if not you should watch it it s my family s favorite christmas movie so it is probably no wonder that while watching it i got inspired to design and knit some dishcloth/washcloth for all of them it s a very quick and fun knit which is also very suitable for last minute gifts **materials** you will need the following materials * cotton yarn in your favorite color roughly 85m / 50 g i ve used kurtenbach twister curly 8 uni 85m / 50g yarn usage depends on weight and needle size my dishcloth required 35g of yarn * matching needles for your yarn i used a 2 5 mm needle because i wanted to achieve a denser fabric * tapestry needle
